name: Now I See (LILYINTHELU, SpicyTangerine, Jacob Zhai)

description:

How To Play:

Interact with the world by walking using WASD, clicking on, standing by, and passing by objects.

Notice:

Please avoid double clicking on objects as certain bugs are yet to be fixed.
